channel.title: Python :: CC 410 Textbook
channel.description: Outline Here is a basic outline of the steps to follow to complete this example. Clone Starter Code from GitHub git clone <url> python Run Project cd python python3 -m src Install Tox pip3 install tox Check & Test Existing Project python3 -m tox Confirm that project runs and has no style errors. Follow along with the video to update the project. Add the option to filter by Rotten Tomatoes Rating and Genre yourself.
